title: Riot I have hosetd over 500 Prized Brackets Please Read! Requesting Prized Tournaments - Section!
body:
We need a section for prized tournaments advertising! 

I'm not sure how the reporting system works in the forums, but it feels like every time I post, my post is deleted.

We do post looking for players to play in our events. And my personal postings seem to get auto deleted within minutes of being posted. And I have not posted a single post in days.

I would like to point out the follow active threads in the "Team Recruitment" that are still advertising just like we have been doing for the last 2 years.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/3EX0AExL-support-main-lf-goldplat-team-to-playsub

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/3EX0AExL-support-main-lf-goldplat-team-to-playsub

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Having one section dedicated to Prized Tournaments and allowing us to advertise our non profit events would really solve a lot of problems! And I'm willing to help you moderate it.

I really hope this posts gets some attention!

replies.body:
Greetings Elduris,

Thank you for your support! I'm 34 years old, I do this for fun and for all the gamers! 

At first I did not post because I had a feeling nobody would respond.

If we don't step up to the plate we can't get a hit! The same thing goes for advertising for new players! If we don't take action we must assume word of mouth will be sufficient.

Loving my Typo in the subject! I hope it sticks out like I planned!

Hello!

Elduris talked to me about your inquiry, and I would like to talk to you in a one-on-one setting so we can talk about it more in-depth.

[Submit a new ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new ), and then reply back to me with its ticket number so I can find it.

As for your second one, this one was already escalated to someone who can help answer this!

Hey ThePinkGoat! 

This is an awesome idea! I think it'd definitely be beneficial to the community to have a board dedicated to organized tournaments. I'll see if I can forward this to someone at Riot. In the meantime, have my upvote!

We do have one in the Esports, and thanks for the comment MzKumakuma.


Currently these forums have a , "Miscellaneous" and "Memes & Games". 1000s of players go looking for daily prized tournaments. Not everyone knows about the prized tournaments search because 99.9% of us use these forums to find a place to play.

I'm so freaking passionate about this! I really want to help out, and I know my suggestion would benefit 100s of smaller start ups and the many large organizations like mine. 

I'm simply trying to protect the interest of the smaller sites, and offer a fair advertising to all of us.{{champion:78}}

Correct we run random mixed elo and pre made team brackets. IF you are looking for Elo sorthing I suggest you go to my buddy at HKG! They have a awesome setup!

EVG is not for everyone, I wanted EVG to appeal to a select group of players. So far the select group is very large and growing in size!. Your IMO is in the wrong board, this is the Help\Support section, trying to get a new feature added to the forums for everyone to enjoy! Including yourself!

Thanks for the comments!

Goat
Wonderful thanks for your continued support!

I think that this is an awesome idea.  It would be nice to able to speed the word about EVG tournaments on a more broad spectrum.  Word of mouth along with media (website, etc.) has taken EVG very far and it is amazing to see how the summoners come together to play in such low stress environment.  Each person interacting with one another and many friendship bonds are made through this.  From my time with EVG it has been an amazing experience to see the amount of people who join up and come back day to day.  It would be awesome to see this small community grow.

Had heard of EVG before but forgot about them.  Saw your post and decided to check them out, as my 5s team is looking for some premade 5s tournaments.  Sadly, your "we encourage smurfing" stance in the rules has turned me away.  I wish y'all did some fair tournaments and my team might be up for them.  But I don't really feel like playing Diamonds (or their smurf accounts).  Just free RP for high elo players.
I'm happy to discuses this with you. I have spoken with a member of your staff before on Skype. I also have TeamSpeak. What is your preference?
